#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
     int tcase;
     scanf("%d",&tcase);
     while(tcase--)
     {
          int n,x,y,i;
          int c1=0,c2=0,c3=0,c4=0;
          scanf("%d",&n);
          for(i=0;i<n;i++)
          {
               scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
               x=x*x;
               y=y*y;
               double dist=sqrt(x+y);
               if(dist<=60)
                    c1++;
               else if(dist<=120&&dist>60)
                    c2++;
               else if(dist<=180&&dist>120)
                    c3++;
               else if(dist<=200&&dist>180)
                    c4++;
          }
          printf("%d %d %d %d\n",c1,c2,c3,c4);
     }
     return 0;
}
